item.description:
***BEGINNING FRIDAY MAY 21 BOSTON HAPPY HOUR MEMBERS ARE INVITED BY BOSTON EVENT GUIDE AND THE RED SOX NATIVES, TO A ROOF DECK PARTY AT SPLASH ON THE THIRD FRIDAY AND FIRST THURSDAY OF EACH MONTH THROUGH SEPTEMBER***

We have arranged a special Happy Hour/Roof Deck Party at Splash Ultra Lounge for Boston Happy Hour members. This is an amazing venue with a plush lounge and one of Boston's best and largest roof decks with cabanas, complimentary hors d'oeuvres and billiards. A perfect place to hang out and enjoy a few drinks on a warm night, watch the Sox game at 7pm or sit inside in our reserved section.

Join the Red Sox Natives and other groups for a Rush Hour at Splash Ultra Lounge from 5 pm to 9 pm on Friday, May 21. This is one of Boston's newest hotspots with up to 4 hours of complimentary food buffet and cash bar.

Admission is free for those who RSVP here and to www.bostoneventguide.com/rushhour to get added to the guest list. Please follow these directions. Invite friends, guests, co-workers and groups.

Splash has a Dress Code: Dress to impress, no sneakers, t-shirts or hats.

Ask the hostess for the Red Sox Natives reserved section when checking in.

All guests must be 21 plus with proper ID.

Nearest MBTA stops are Red Line at South Station or Orange Line at Chinatown.

Metered street parking is available in the area.

Valet parking is $20.00.

Please remember to maintain your bar tab or pay cash for your drinks.

www.bostoneventguide.com

www.splash-boston.com

www.redsoxnatives.com
item.name: Rush Hour at Splash Sponsored by Boston Event Guide and Red Sox Natives
